text: @LatestMessiah This proves, to anyone who had any residual doubt, that #Corbyn’s intellect is below that of a turnip on his allotment, while his ego exceeds the size of a large planet. A dangerous combination in any person. #corbyn here featuring as a #coronavirus spreader
